argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dfrhm2 | |- RingHom = ( r e. Ring , s e. Ring |-> ( ( r GrpHom s ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> RingHom = ( r e. Ring , s e. Ring |-> ( ( r GrpHom s ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( r GrpHom s ) = ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( mulGrp ` s ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_oveqan12d | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_ineq12d | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( ( r GrpHom s ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) ) = ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ ( r = R /\ s = S ) ) -> ( ( r GrpHom s ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) ) = ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R GrpHom S ) e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_inex1 | |- ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) e. _V |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 14 | 2, 8, 9, 10, 13 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> ( R RingHom S ) = ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
